title: Net Force - 7 - State of War - Tom Clancy - Steve Pieczenik {dus
description:
Title: Cybernation, State of War #7
Author: Tom Clancy, Steve Pieczenik
Length: 6 hrs and 4 mins
Publisher: HarperAudio - Audible
Encoding: mp3(vbr 128-192)
Ripped by: dusion

Publisher's Summary
In the year 2010, computers are the new superpowers. Those who control them control the world. To enforce the Net Laws, Congress creates the ultimate computer security agency within the FBP the Net Force.

Minor viruses are eating away at the Net Force computers. The e-mail shut-downs and flickering monitors are hardly emergencies, but they've been keeping the tech department hopping. Same with the sudden rash of time-consuming lawsuits. No one in the Net Force has a moment to spare, which is exactly the way Mitchell Townsend Ames wants it. Because when the shadowy mastermind launches his master plan, he wants Net Force to be looking the other way. A powerful examination of America's defense and intelligence systems of the future, Tom Clancy's Net Force is the creation of Tom Clancy and Steve Pieczenik.
